name: Tap Forward
description:
Have you even wondered what will happen to you in 30, 50 or 100 years from now?
Have you ever wondered what it would be like to time travel?

Now you can!! Tap tap tap your way into the future, TAP Forward!

Game features:
- Amazingly fun idle game mechanics
- Upgrades & power ups to boost your progress
- Get sick but try not to die!
- Life events will tell you what's going on around your life
- As you grow, you will discover new faces

Grow and get old! Experience new things, and heck even get sick!!
Try to reach your last breath AND don't let him die!!

Enjoy.
